          <title>
            <string language="sl">Magnetno odklanjanje</string>
            <string language="en">Magnetic deflection</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magnetische Ablenkung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Débattement magnétique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Deflexão magnética</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Deviazione magnetica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαγνητική εκτροπή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Desviación magnética</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Razumevanje magnetnega odklona na primeru gibanja nabitih delcev v magnetnem polju.</string>
            <string language="en">Simulation of magnetic deflection - charged particles moving through magnetic field.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">magnetno polje</string>
            <string language="en">magnetic field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">magnetni odklon</string>
            <string language="en">magnetic deflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">jacob</string>
            <string language="en">jacob</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Simulation der magnetischen Ablenkung - die 
belasteten Partikel, die durch magnetisches bewegen, fangen 
auf.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Simulation de débattement magnétique - 
particules chargées se déplaçant par le champ magnétique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Simulação da deflexão magnética - partículas
carregadas que movem-se através do campo magnético.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Simulazione di deviazione magnetica - particelle 
caricate che si muovono attraverso il campo magnetico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προσομοίωση της μαγνητικής εκτροπής - χρεωμένα μόρια 
που κινούνται μέσω του μαγνητικού πεδίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Simulación de la desviación magnética - 
partículas cargadas que se mueven a través de campo magnético.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetische Ablenkung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">colos</string>
